title: Barry Andrews (politician) - Wikipedia
snippet: Andrews also founded the Brussels-Belfast Forum with members of the Northern Ireland Assembly. He was appointed EU Chief Observer for the 2023 Nigerian Federal and State elections by High Representative Vice President Josep Borrell. A report on the election was subsequently produced highlighting that the election was marred by a lack of transparency, public mistrust in the Independent National Electoral Commission ...
